name: MobileSystemFacade
doc: Common operations implemented by each mobile platform.

findSuggestions.doc: Find suggestions in the OS contact provider.

saveContacts.doc: Store one or more contacts in system's contact book

syncContacts.doc: Sync all Tuta contacts with system's contact book, this operation includes Inserts, Updates and Deletions

deleteContacts.doc: Delete all or a specific Tuta contact from system's contact book

goToSettings.doc: Redirect the user to Phone's Settings

shareText.doc: Share the text via OS sharing mechanism.
